insert into sap_data(line, billdate, pkid, deptid, goodsid, pbseqid, posbillno, total, billtypeid, fgtyp,dateupload) values
(#{item.line},#{item.billdate},#{item.pkid},#{item.deptid}, #{item.goodsid},#{item.pbseqid},#{item.posbillno},#{item.total},#{item.billtypeid},#{item.fgtyp},#{item.dateupload})

insert into report(line, bill_no, sap_num, erp_num,status,msg,business_id,company_id,type,ware_inside_code,price,ware_inside_code1,ware_inside_code2) values
(#{item.line},#{item.billNo},#{item.sapNum},#{item.erpNum},#{item.status},#{item.msg},#{item.businessId}, #{item.companyId},#{item.type},#{item.wareInsideCode},#{item.price},#{item.wareInsideCode1},#{item.wareInsideCode2})

(#{item.billNumber},#{item.orderId},#{item.billType},#{item.changeStockQty},#{item.sapNum},#{item.billOperateTime},#{item.wareInsideCode},#{item.status},#{item.originNum}, #{item.line},#{item.companyId},#{item.businessId})
